categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Calle was a female Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, she was stationed at the Business Sector Tram Station in the Government District region of the planet Corellia, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.
Sergeant Calle appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
